calculations.name: Failure Risk
calculations.tableau_expression: IF [Loss Flag]=1 AND  [Discount Tier]="High Discount " THEN "High Risk" ELSE "Low Risk" END

calculation_context.Expression: IF [Loss Flag]=1 AND  [Discount Tier]="High Discount " THEN "High Risk" ELSE "Low Risk" END

calculated_fields.Discount Tier: IF [Discount Health]>0.25 THEN "High Discount" ELSEIF  [Discount Health]>0.10 THEN "Medium Discount" ELSE "Low Discont" END
